page.title: 10POLICEMAN'S WORK PLEAN/COWIE
page.content: "My name is William MacFarlane and I am the{Community policeman}for this area. My day usually begins at 9a.m. although my hours are flexible to cater for discretionary evening work. My duties entail visiting schools where I give talks on various subjects such as road safety etc. I am also responsible for investigating any crimes committed in my area. I patrol much of the area on foot in order to maintain close contact with the people. In the evenings I frequently attend Youth Clubs and Community Council meetings. I also attend summer Galas and Fetes, in fact any occasion where my presence would be of benefit to the community."
